response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value to us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the opportunity to acquire something truly special at a price that reflects its true value. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for both parties, ensuring you receive a high-quality product while allowing us to maximize the value of our investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
